original_text: You saw that there were many holes in the walls of the City of David. You stored water in the Lower Pool.
korean_text: 너희가 다윗 성의 무너진 곳이 많은 것도 보며 너희가 아랫못의 물도 모으며

sentences.original_text: You saw that there were many holes
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 많은 구멍들이 있는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: in the walls of the City of David.
